alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 8:10PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN RAPIDES AND EASTERN VERNON PARISHES THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 810 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gardner, or 8 miles southwest of Alexandria International Airport, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hineston, Lacamp, Leander, Sieper, Gardner, Otis, Elmer, and Calcasieu. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
